briefTitle: Development and Validation of a Risk Prediction Model for Ischemic Stroke in Acute Myocardial Infarction Without Comorbid Atrial Fibrillation
officialTitle: Development and Validation of a Risk Prediction Model for Ischemic Stroke in Acute Myocardial Infarction Without Comorbid Atrial Fibrillation

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* myocardial infarction without atrial fibrillation

Exclusion Criteria:

* Thrombophilia
* Paradoxical Embolism through a Patent Foramen Ovale (PFO)
* Iatrogenic embolism
* Coronary slow-flow phenomenon
* Coronary vasospasm
* Dissection,

primary.description: Calibrationevaluates how closely predicted probabilities match actual observed outcomes in a prediction model. It measures whether a model's confidence in its predictions reflects reality.
A standard metric to evaluate the performance of classification models.

dataSource: ClinicalTrials.gov API v2 - Ultimate Complete Collection
